{{disambig-two|an Elvish [[Sundocarme|root]]|[[Noldorin]] noun|[[bâd]]}}

'''BAD''' is a [[Primitive Quendian]] [[Sundocarme|root]] with two different etymologies (BAD<sup>[1]</sup> and BAD<sup>[2]</sup>). Both appear without any any signification, besides from what can be determined from their derivatives.<ref name=Ety>{{LR|Etymologies}}, p. 350 (root appearing as "BAD-")</ref><ref name=VT45>{{VT|45a}}, p. 6 (root appearing as "BAD<sup>[2]</sup>-")</ref>

==Derivatives of BAD<sup>[1]</sup>==

*[[Common Eldarin]]: ''bad-'' ("judge")<ref name=Ety/>
**[[Noldorin]]: ''bauð'', ''bād-'' ("judgement"); ''badhor'', ''baðron'' ("judge")<ref name=Ety/>

There were no [[Quenya]] derivatives of BAD<sup>[1]</sup>.<ref name=Ety/>

==Derivatives of BAD<sup>[2]</sup>==

*[[Common Eldarin]]: ''banda'' ("prison, Hell")<ref name=VT45/>
**[[Quenya]]: ''vanda'' ("prison, Hell")<ref name=VT45/>
**[[Noldorin]]: [[band|''band'', ''bann'']] ("prison, Hell")<ref name=VT45/>

==See also==

*[[MBAD]]
